reviewText: This is region 2 DVD. Be warned, it would play on your general devices; Xbox, DVD player, PS4. I'm pissed! Should've mentioned that
I should've done more research on this product . This CD doesn't work in any of my DVD players. Can't return it. Now I'm left with a random CD. Sucks.
Got dvd in new spotless excellent condition and way before the actual due date period!  Would buy again!!!
It was good but, it won't work on my DVD player I try 2 DVD player n my ps3. It didn't work but I use my laptop n it's work.
